ui.shopSubtitle: Run your shop by balancing water quality, food, and breeding.
ui.deleteSaveConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete all save data and start over?
This cannot be undone.
ui.autoReorderTanks: Auto-move empty tanks to the bottom
ui.selectHatchDesc: Choose 1 from 10 candidates. The rest will be sold automatically.
ui.cannotSellThisMonth: Cannot sell individuals acquired this month
ui.breedingSelectDesc: Select one male and one female. They will share a tank and attempt to lay eggs each month.
ui.lineageIntroDesc: Select an external purchase to reduce inbreeding by 20. The donor is consumed.
ui.treatSelectDesc: Select a sick axolotl to start treatment for ¬•5,000. Recovery chance next month.
ui.shopDesc: Occasionally unfixed individuals may arrive in the live tab.
ui.juvenileSelectDesc: Sell all of a type or select one to move to another tank.
ui.problemRecovery: May recover with care. Price is about 25% of normal.
ui.initialLog: Shop started. 2 parent axolotls, 3 tanks. Manage water and food.
ui.waterChanged: Changed water in tank {{n}}. Water quality improved.
ui.breedingStarted: Started cohabitation in tank {{n}} with {{t1}} and {{t2}}.
ui.cleanSelectDesc: Select a tank to change water for ¬•500. Improves water quality.
ui.alreadySold: This individual has already been sold.
ui.namingSuccess: Let's make a great shop with {{name}}!
ui.emptyTankHint: You can add new axolotls here.
ui.endMessage: Congratulations on reaching the goal. We hope to see you again!

game.passwordCopiedAlert: Password copied! Save it in a note.
game.hatchConfirmTitle: Sell other eggs and keep this one?
game.fixedSuccess: [Fixed!] {{type}} is now fixed. Earned {{reward}}. Available in shop.
game.fixedSuccessSuperblack: [Fixed!] {{type}} is now fixed. Dark black fixed, so Super Black is also fixed. Earned {{reward}}. Available in shop.
game.hatchSelected: Selected {{type}} from hatched larvae. Sold remaining {{count}} for {{price}}.
game.juvenileMoved: Selected 1 {{type}} juvenile and moved to another tank.
game.eggsLaid: Breeding success! {{count}} eggs laid in tank {{n}}.
game.eggsSoldNoSpace: No empty tank. Sold {{count}} eggs for {{price}}.
game.allPoopCleaned: Cleaned poop in all tanks. ({{n}} spots)
game.shopArrival: [Live Shop] Unfixed individual arrived. Check the live tab.
game.juvenileGrew: Juvenile grew into {{type}} adult. {{count}} others sold.
game.diedNeglect: One axolotl died from poor water and food conditions.
game.fedAllArtificial: Fed artificial feed to all. Low dirt, normal growth.
game.fedAllBloodworm: Fed bloodworm to all. High dirt, boosted growth.
game.fedAllEarthworm: Fed earthworm to all. Medium dirt, best growth.
game.noTankSpace: No empty tank for new axolotl.
game.bottomCleanerUpgrade: Upgraded bottom cleaner to level {{level}}. (Reduces poop)
game.tankLevelUp: Upgraded tank equipment to level {{level}}. (Max {{max}} tanks)
game.passwordGenerated: Password generated. Copy and save it.

equipment.autoFeederDesc: Auto-feeds hungry axolotls each turn ({{cost}} per individual).
equipment.filterDesc: Slows water quality decline. Each turn, water quality recovers slightly in active tanks.
equipment.bottomCleanerDesc: Lv1+: Reduces water quality drop and poop rate when unmaintained. Higher levels = better effect.
equipment.medicineDesc: Starts treatment for sick axolotls. Select target and buy. Chance to recover next month. (¬•5,000/individual)
equipment.feedDetail: Artificial: Basic feed. Bloodworm: ¬•5,000 ‚Äî High dirt, boosted growth. Earthworm: ¬•15,000 ‚Äî Medium dirt, best growth. Unlock in order.
equipment.addTankDetail:
Tank facility level: Lv1‚ÄìLv{{maxLevel}}
Max tanks increase per level (Lv1=2, Lv2=3‚Ä¶).
Both level-up and adding tanks require funds.

typeDesc.nomal: Most common type. Hardy and easy to raise.
typeDesc.albino: White body. Slightly weak but cheap.
typeDesc.gold: Golden color. Slightly weak but popular and valuable.
typeDesc.marble: Marble pattern. Hardiest, least prone to sickness.
typeDesc.copper: Copper color. Very rare, weak before fixing.
typeDesc.superblack: Pure black. From dark black fixing.
typeDesc.goldblackeye: Gold with black eyes. Very rare, weak before fixing.
typeDesc.chimera: Different types on each side. Extremely rare, weak before fixing.
typeDesc.yellow: From dark gold. Can be fixed.
typeDesc.dalmatian: White with black spots. Ultra rare. Only from leucistic x marble.

achievement.breed_success_desc: Successfully breed for the first time
achievement.basic_five_desc: Get all 5 basic types (Leucistic, Albino, Gold, Marble, Black)
achievement.rare_obtained_desc: Obtain at least one rare type

manual.rulesIntro: Upa Lupa Shop is a breeding sim where you raise and sell axolotls.
manual.rules1: Manage water quality and food to keep axolotls healthy
manual.rules2: Adults (12+ months) can breed. Select male and female
manual.rules3: Choose good individuals from bred offspring to raise
manual.rules4: Goal: raise reputation and reach target money
manual.fixedIntro: Fixing means breeding the same type for 3 generations in a row.
manual.fixed1: Fixed types become available in the shop
manual.fixed2: Grandparents, parents, and offspring must all be same type
manual.fixed3: Earn money as a fixing reward
manual.fixedHow2: Raise offspring to be same type
manual.fixedHow3: When offspring is 12+ months, breed with same type
manual.fixedHow4: Raise that offspring to same type
manual.rare1: Rare types may appear when breeding different types
manual.rare2: Combine Gold, Black, Copper etc. for better odds
manual.rare3: Unfixed rare types are weak. Raise carefully until fixed
manual.tips1: Keep water quality above 40. Low quality causes sickness and lower rep
manual.tips2: Clean poop regularly. It lowers water quality
manual.tips3: Feed types vary. Artificial is cheap but weak, earthworm is expensive but best
manual.tips5: Inbreeding weakens individuals and increases sickness
manual.tips6: You can name tanks and the shop (click to change)
